description: The miniseries explores the rise and fall of the company, which in 2019 was valued at $64 billion. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: WeCrashed: Oscar winners Jared Leto, Anne Hathaway dig deep into couple behind WeWork
title_page: WeCrashed: Oscar winners Jared Leto, Anne Hathaway dig deep into couple behind WeWork | The Straits Times
maintext:
LOS ANGELES - In the new miniseries WeCrashed, Oscar winners Jared Leto and Anne Hathaway play Adam and Rebekah Neumann, the controversial couple behind the much-hyped start-up WeWork.
Making its debut on Apple TV+ on March 18, WeCrashed explores the greed-filled rise and fall of the company, which provided co-working spaces and was valued at US$47 billion (S$64 billion) in 2019 before imploding the following year.
